title: Justin Bieber removes Hailey's garter with his teeth in unseen sexy wedding snaps
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Justin Bieber has shared racy unseen wedding photographs with his wife Hailey.

The Baby hitmaker, 25, gave fans a look at the intimate moment he removed his stunning new wife's garter after the glittering ceremony last week, in South Carolina.

In the sultry snap shared on Wednesday, the groom took off the garter with his teeth while his bride exposed her enviably-toned leg in the soaring split of her silk slip-on dress.

The second snap captured the happy couple enjoying an affectionate moment on the dance floor among their celebrity guests.

A beaming Hailey threw her arms around her husband Justin's neck as they looked more in love than ever.

He captioned the photo slider: "Yeee."

However, some fans were distracted by one of the guest's feet in the background of the photo of Justin taking off the garter.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Eagle-eyed followers noticed one wedding guest had worn Justin's Drewhouse Hotel slippers to the bash.

There is a distinctive smiley face on the front of the slipper. The pair of slippers would have set the guest back $5.

Bride Hailey turned her wedding into her own personal catwalk as she modelled three wedding dresses at the spectacular occasion.

They exchanged vows in front of 154 A-list guests including the likes of Kendall and Kylie Jenner, Jaden Smith and Ed Sheeran.

The loved-up couple were married in a legal ceremony last September in a courtroom in New York City.

Yet the lovebirds spared no expensive with their lavish wedding ceremony in South Carolina with $50 wedding gifts, personalised champagne bottles and spa treatments.
description: Justin Bieber has given fans another look at his lavish wedding with Hailey in sexy unseen photographs
